Package org.opt4j.core.start

Class Opt4JStarter

java.lang.Object
org.opt4j.core.config.Starter
org.opt4j.core.start.Opt4JStarter
public class Opt4JStarter extends Starter
The Opt4JStarter starts configuration files directly without the configurator (GUI).
